ability1.name: Strong Basic
ability1.description: Deal 3 damage to a chosen enemy. 1 SP

ability2.name: Healing Staff
ability2.description: Heal 3 hp to a chosen ally or yourself. 1 SP

ability1.name: Watering
ability1.description: Heal 2 hp and 1 SP to a chosen ally or yourself, also removes fire debuff. 2 SP

ability2.name: Big Leaf
ability2.description: Cover yourself, ignoring all damage you receive for a turn. 1 SP

ability1.name: Ban
ability1.description: Deal 3 damage to a chosen enemy and apply stun for the next turn. 2 SP

ability2.name: Execute
ability2.description: Deal 5 damage to a chosen enemy, ignores the tough buff. 3 SP

ability1.name: Big Bite
ability1.description: Deal 1 damage to all enemies and every enemy has a 50% chance to also get bleed for 2 turns. 1 SP

ability2.name: Quick Moves
ability2.description: Apply the dodgy buff to yourself for 3 turns. 2 SP

ability1.name: Med-kit
ability1.description: Heal 5 hp to a chosen ally or yourself. 2 SP

ability2.name: Relax
ability2.description: Relax and receive 1 SP.

ability1.name: Firey Touch
ability1.description: Apply the fire debuff to a chosen enemy for 3 turns. 1 SP

ability2.name: Warmth
ability2.description: For every enemy that is on fire, heal your whole team by 1 hp. 1 SP

ability1.name: Venom Bite
ability1.description: Deal 1 damage and apply poison to a chosen enemy for 2 turns. 1 SP

ability2.name: Poisoned Blood
ability2.description: For every enemy that has the poison debuff, deal 1 damage to a chosen enemy. 1 SP

ability1.name: Enemy Team hack
ability1.description: Deal 1 damage to the whole enemy team. 1 SP

ability2.name: Team hack
ability2.description: Heal 1 hp to everyone on your team. 1 SP

ability1.name: Enemy hack
ability1.description: Apply a random debuff to a chosen enemy for 2 turns. 1 SP

ability2.name: Ally hack
ability2.description: Apply a random buff to a chosen ally or yourself for 2 turns. 1 SP

ability1.name: Pure Metal
ability1.description: Apply the tough and strong buff to yourself for 2 turns. 2 SP

ability2.name: Body Guard
ability2.description: Apply the tough buff onto an ally or yourself for 3 turns. 1 SP

ability1.name: Corrupt Energy
ability1.description: Deal 1 damage to everyone, including yourself, enemy team and your team. 1 SP

ability2.name: Impale
ability2.description: Deal 4 damage to a chosen enemy. 2 SP

ability1.name: Wind
ability1.description: Apply the dodgy buff to an ally or yourself for 2 turns. 1 SP

ability2.name: Fly High
ability2.description: Prevent all incoming damage onto your team for the next turn. 4 SP

ability1.name: Roll a Dice
ability1.description: Roll a random number from 3 to 35 and set that number as your max HP. 1 SP

ability2.name: Trusty Flintlock
ability2.description: Deal either 6 damage to a random enemy or lose 3 hp. 1 SP
